title: Happiness Is: 500 Danish quotes on happiness through life
description: HAPPINESS ISâ€¦ A BEAUTIFUL THING TO EXPERIENCE - AND AN EVEN MORE BEAUTIFUL THING TO SHARE We are all drawn to happiness. This very special state that grants us courage, fills us with driving power and opens our eyes to the light side of life. More than once, the Danes have been named the happiest people in the world. But is it a title they can pride themselves with forever, or will they have to work to find and keep their happiness? In the book Happiness is..., Danes of all ages offer their perception of happiness. The book is a collection of touching descriptions, beautiful images, fun facts and wonderful quotes from hundreds of Danes on their happiness. About the Mette Odderskov (b.1973) is a twin, married and mother of two girls. She is a qualified drop-in center manager and today works as department head. Like many Danes, Mette Odderskov has family who emigrated to the United States in the beginning of the 20th century.
author: Mette Odderskov
